name: Hanoi Pearl Apartment
address: Unit 404, 33 Phan Boi Chau, Hoan Kiem, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Hanoi Pear Apartment 2 offers accommodation in Hanoi, 200 metres from Quan Su Temple and 700 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral. Hanoi Pear Apartment 2 features views of the city and is 900 metres from Vietnam Fine Arts Museum. Free WiFi is featured .

The kitchen features a dishwasher and an oven, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Towels and bed linen are offered at Hanoi Pear Apartment 2. There is a private bathroom with a bath.

Hanoi Temple of Literature is 900 metres from Hanoi Pear Apartment 2, while Trang Tien Plaza is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from Hanoi Pear Apartment 2.
